title: PM lauds President Erdogan for leading rescue, relief efforts in flood hit areas
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 11 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday lauded President of Turkiye Recep Tayyip Erdogan for expressing solidarity at Resilient Pakistan conference held in Geneva.
On his Twitter handle, the prime minister said that President Erdogan personally led Turkiye’s rescue and relief efforts for the flood-affected people of Pakistan.
“We greatly acknowledge Turkiye’s contributions,” he added.
